ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: About Darkfox...
ygData.msgSnippet: I grabbed the new lvl 20 breeze song.  It must be breeze while 32 is clarity .  I wonder if they ll twist...heh.  I don t get an icon when I play it, just
ygData.messageBody:
I grabbed the new lvl 20 breeze song. It must be "breeze" while 32 is
"clarity". I wonder if they'll twist...heh. I don't get an icon when I
play it, just the message. The casters say it helps. I wonder if that's
just wishful thinking, or it really does help 2 levels before the level 32
one.

I tried Cazic. Was hard getting groups, because the place was empty. :(
Kunark, is easy finding groups, but there are so many people.

Gah...too much thinking...I go home now.

/bye :)

At

-----Original Message-----
From: blitz_krieg@... [mailto:blitz_krieg@...]
Sent: Monday, February 26, 2001 4:34 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Re: About Darkfox...


> >Shoot me a tell sometime, if ya want. If you're around level
> >30, I'd love to group. I've always wanted to have another bard
> >in the group that knew enough about the songs and how to twist
> >to coordinate a 6 song crescendo of power that NONE CAN
> >WITHSTAND..MWHAHAHAHAA!
>
> I think Dark may be level 32 now, yes? *Smiles*
>
> Actually, if I remember correctly, Dark is a couple of levels ahead
> of me, so I would guess about 56 now.


LOL, yeah, 56 now. But, I do remember the pure unadulterated PLing
power when I hit 32 and grouped with 5 casters in Cazic. :)

Even if we can't coordinate a crescendo of power on creatures where
we'd both get exp, I am always willing to talk strategy.

I love the new and improved, more accurate Xegony Bard count macro. :)

Darkfox
